alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Mainland Dare; Mainland Hyde (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued January 07 at 3:04PM EST until January 10 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...2 to 4 feet of inundation above ground level possible in low-lying areas near tidal waterways. * WHERE...Areas along Pamlico Sound, Pamlico and Pungo Rivers and adjacent tidal creeks. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...2 to 4 feet of inundation above ground level is possible in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways resulting in a threat of property damage. Some roads and low lying property including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes adjacent to the waterfront will experience shallow flooding.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
